boardgame.name: GIPF
GIPF mini
boardgame.description: GIPF is a strategic game for two players based on a classic concept: In turns, players introduce one piece into play until achieving four-in a-row. Players then remove their row and capture any of their opponent's pieces which extend that row. This principle of capturing pieces creates each time again completely changed situations on the board. The purpose is to form successive rows of at least four pieces, until the opponent has no piece left to bring into play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;GIPF is not only the name of a game, but of a project as well. This project concerns a group of games and extra pieces that will follow step by step. Each game of the project will be playable either separately, or, by means of extra pieces, in combination with GIPF. It concerns a system that makes winning or losing GIPF-related games a strategic factor of the game GIPF itself._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game is part of project GIPF._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to follow through with the transaction. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. We will accept returns within 5 days of your receipt of the order. We only accept returns on items which are in their original condition. Original condition means, the game have not been played and all parts are in the same condition as they were when you received the game. We only refund shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Otherwise in excellent condition ============================================== The games I am selling come from my personal collection. I often have bought games used or traded for them. I will do my best to accurately describe their condition. I will confirm completeness in most cases (unless stated otherwise) but not for items that come in large quantities for which a few missing will make no difference (like stacks of paper money for example). Please note that I am not concerned about inserts and may have removed them from a game that I felt didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need them. I might not think to mention that in the description. If you are interested in the insert, please ask. Note that our home is smoke-free but not pet-free. I can not guarantee the complete absence of cat hair in the boxes I prefer to ship via USPS Priority. I use non-Flat Rate boxes unless it will save you money for me to use Flat Rate boxes. I buy the postage on-line and charge the exact cost to the buyer. I am happy to combine multiple items to save you on shipping I have perfect feedback here on BGG. On ebay, where I am selling my record collection, I am ronattic, and have 100% positive feedback. So please buy with confidence.
